DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability MP0112 ( novel , potentially long act VEGF inhibitor ) patient wet Age Related Macular Degeneration .
DOC.brief_title: Study MP0112 Intravitreal Injection Patients With Wet Age Related Macular Degeneration
